column4: please help me ! i need convert FAT32 -> NTFS without loss data on ubuntu .....
You cannot convert a FAT32 volume to NTFS. All you can do is make a new NTFS volume and then copy the data across
with windows XP i can convert FAT to NTFS easy with one command line, so i think is same with ubuntu

As I say its a long time since I used windows. Sounds risky anyway. It might be safer to copy the FAT32 volume to an external hard drive, then delete the partition in GParted and make a new NTFS partition. Then copy the data back. Thats how I would do it to be on the safe side. Otherwise if something goes wrong during the conversion process you could lose data
